description: Source file defining the 'Board' class which models an 8x8 chessboard, including state management, move execution, and setup routines.
external_methods: PieceType.R, PieceType.N, PieceType.B, PieceType.Q, PieceType.K, PieceType.P

classes.name: Board
classes.description: Represents an 8x8 chessboard with associated game state including piece placement, castling rights, en-passant target, move clocks, and side-to-move indicator.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Creates a deep copy of the current Board, duplicating all state fields and piece positions.

methods.name: pieceAt
methods.description: Returns the piece at a specified board index or null if empty.

methods.name: setupInitial
methods.description: Initializes the board with the standard starting position of a chess game.

methods.name: doMove
methods.description: Executes a move on the board, updating state accordingly and returning an UndoInfo object for move reversal.

methods.name: undoMove
methods.description: Reverts a move based on previously saved UndoInfo, restoring the board to its previous state.
